title: Dewey Brain v3.1 — Hybrid LLM with Compressed Core, Indexed Library, and Strict Relearning Protocol
description: Public RFC and architecture spec for a modular, edge-capable LLM with compressed core, semantic index, hot-swappable library blocks, and a strict continual learning protocol.
notes: Includes README, diagram, and references. Replace the DOI in CITATION.cff after Zenodo publishes.
